name: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

name: The Godfather
description: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

name: The Dark Knight
description: Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice when the Joker wreaks havoc on Gotham.

name: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in tales of violence and redemption.

name: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea.

name: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.

name: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, and other events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with a low IQ.

name: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

name: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

name: Gladiator
description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

name: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

name: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A meek Hobbit and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy a powerful ring and save Middle-earth.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom.

name: The Lion King
description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

name: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to catch another serial killer.

name: Saving Private Ryan
description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed.

name: The Social Network
description: The story of how Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg created Facebook and faced legal and personal consequences.

name: Parasite
description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

name: Oppenheimer
description: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer, the theoretical physicist behind the development of the atomic bomb.
